item.title: Getting started with hybris
item.description: Installation of an example implementation of the hybris platform # To have a look of the different functionalities of the hybris platform, you can use the install recipes. For this, just download the HYBRISCOMMXXXX_X-XXXXXXXX.ZIP and extract it to you local device. Than go through the following steps: The <recipe_names> you can find under the folder \hybris\installer\recipes. Windows: open command shell Browse to the \hybris\installer directory install.bat -r <recipe_name> install.bat -r <recipe_name> initialize install.
